title: Christina Reinhold appointed Commercial Director of InterCityHotelsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Christina Reinhold appointed Commercial Director of InterCityHotels Published on : Thursday, August 20, 2015
Christina Reinhold is the new Commercial Director of InterCityHotel GmbH, one of the three brands of the Steigenberger Hotel Group and a highly successful company in its own right. In her new role, Ms. Reinhold will be responsible for marketing, advertising and sales measures.
Christina Reinhold holds a degree in tourism management and can look back at many years of experience in the hotel branch. She spent a total of eight years working for Fairmont, Raffles and Swissôtel (FRHI Hotels & Resorts) at a Global Sales level.
In her most recent positions as Global Account Manager and as Director of Global Accounts, she held responsibility in the field of Business Travel. The latter role involved worldwide representation of the hotels on the German, Austrian and Swiss markets and strategic development of Global Key Accounts in the areas of Corporate, Consortia and Retail Industry.
“We are delighted to be able to welcome Christina Reinhold to the InterCityHotels team,” said Joachim Marusczyk, Executive Vice President of InterCityHotels. “Her expertise in the field of Commercial and Sales will enable her to continue to expand a brand that is constantly growing.”
Source:- Inter City Hotels
